articles.author: Abigail Brooks, MA
articles.title: Assisted Reproductive Technology Safe, Effective for Patients with Chronic Liver Disease - MD Magazine
articles.description: Data presented at The Liver Meeting 2023 from the American Association for the Study of Liver Diseases (AASLD) showed similar assisted reproductive technology outcomes for patients with and without chronic liver disease.
articles.content: Assisted reproductive technology treatment may help improve pregnancy potential in reproductive-aged women, regardless of whether or not they have chronic liver disease, findings from a recent study … [+4440 chars]
